features.name: Multi-Domain Routing System
features.description: Subdomain-based routing handling main site (odillon.fr) and admin panel (admin.odillon.fr) with automatic path redirection.

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete Supabase authentication with email/password login for admin access and session management.

features.name: Photo Management System
features.description: Full CRUD system for managing Hero background photos with monthly themes, awareness campaigns (Octobre Rose, Novembre Bleu), and Supabase Storage integration.

features.name: Dynamic Background Slideshow
features.description: Animated photo carousel for Hero section with smooth fade transitions and automatic monthly theme filtering.

features.name: Gabon Calendar & Events
features.description: Interactive calendar displaying Gabon holidays, national events, and awareness campaigns with color coding.

features.name: Homepage
features.description: Main landing page with Hero, Services, Expertise, About, Contact sections and animated components.

features.name: Services Page
features.description: Dedicated page showcasing corporate engineering, governance, legal, financial, and HR services.

features.name: Expertise Page
features.description: Page highlighting firm's expertise and specializations.

features.name: About Page
features.description: Company information and history page with 3D globe visualization.

features.name: Contact Page
features.description: Contact information and form page for client inquiries.

features.name: Admin Photos Dashboard
features.description: Photo management interface with calendar view, filters by month/theme, upload, edit, and delete functionality.

features.name: Professional Header
features.description: Fixed navigation header with dropdown menus, mobile menu, contact info bar, and smooth scroll links.

features.name: Footer
features.description: Site footer with company links, contact information, and social media.

features.name: Hero Section
features.description: Main hero with animated background slideshow, glassmorphism cards, animated stats counter, and scroll velocity text.

features.name: Trusted By Section
features.description: Marquee section displaying client logos and testimonials with continuous scroll animation.

features.name: shadcn/ui Components
features.description: Complete set of UI components: Button, Card, Input, Textarea, Badge, Dialog, Sheet, Tabs, Accordion, Navigation Menu, Toggle, Toggle Group, Separator, Hover Card.

features.name: Background Effects
features.description: Multiple animated background effects: Aurora, Retro Grid, Grid Pattern, Interactive Grid, Particles.

features.name: Map Visualizations
features.description: Interactive world map with dotted style and 3D rotating globe focused on Gabon.

features.name: Icon Components
features.description: Glassmorphism and 3D icon containers with hover effects.

features.name: Number Animations
features.description: Animated number counter and ticker for statistics display.

features.name: Text Effects
features.description: Animated text effects: Gradient, Highlight, Shimmer.

features.name: Scroll Animations
features.description: Scroll-based animations: Fade In, Blur Fade, Scroll Progress, Scroll to Top, Scroll Velocity, Orbiting Circles.

features.name: Particle Effects
features.description: Interactive particle effects: animated gradient background and mouse-following particle trail.

features.name: Photos API - GET
features.description: Fetch photos with optional filters (month, theme, active status) from Supabase database.

features.name: Photos API - POST
features.description: Create new photo entry with theme, month, and display order (requires authentication).

features.name: Photo API - PATCH
features.description: Update existing photo properties by ID (requires authentication).

features.name: Photo API - DELETE
features.description: Delete photo from database and remove file from Supabase Storage (requires authentication).

features.name: Upload API
features.description: Upload image file to Supabase Storage with validation (max 5MB, JPG/PNG/WebP formats only).

features.name: Auth Callback
features.description: OAuth callback handler for Supabase authentication flow redirects.

features.name: Photo Themes Library
features.description: Photo theme definitions, default Unsplash fallback photos, monthly theme data, and helper functions for filtering photos by month and theme.

features.name: Gabon Events Library
features.description: Comprehensive Gabon holidays and events data with utility functions (getEventsForMonth, getEventForDate, hasEvent, getUpcomingEvents).

features.name: Supabase Clients
features.description: Three separate Supabase clients: browser client for client-side operations, server client for API routes and Server Components with async cookies, and middleware client for session management.

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Helper utilities including cn() function for merging Tailwind CSS classes using clsx and tailwind-merge.

features.name: Custom Baskvill Font
features.description: Local Baskvill font configuration and loading for Next.js display typography.
